titleStmt.title: The life and end of Thomas Awfeeld a seminary preest and Thomas Webley a dyers seruant in London beeing both traitours who were condemned as fellons for bringing seditious books into this realme and dispersing of the same, among their fauourers: for which they were executed at Tibourne the 6. day of this monthe of Iuly. 1585.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Thomas Nelson dwelling at the west end of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; much print show-through. Imperfect as filmed; some pages blurred.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
